tag_list: cloud-storage, cloud-backup, online-backup, online-storage, backup-software, file-sharing, file-backup, gmail-backup, facebook-backup, twitter-backup
overview: Frostbox is a cool new way to back up your social media and files. It’s hard to imagine life without social media and with Frostbox you don’t have to. Instantly backup Facebook, Twitter, Gmail, Flickr and LinkedIn and get access to your files and photos anywhere you need them. You can also back up and edit your documents and pictures on the fly. It’s fast, affordable, and easy to use.
